ZCC.TITLE: Zerto Cloud Connector
ZCC.TOOLTIP: Sites configured for ZORG {0}. Each site requiers a Zerto Cloud Connector to connect ZORG to the site.
ZCC.DELETE_ZCC_WARNING: You are about to remove the Zerto Cloud Connector for ZORG {0}. This will cause a WAN disconnection with the customer site.
ZCC.REDEPLOY_GHOST:
Before redeploying cloud connector {0}, please make sure that cloud connector {1} was deleted from the VC.
Not removing cloud connector will result in IP conflicts and failure to redeploy.
Click Next to continue with redeployment or Cancel if you wish to abort the redeployment.
